alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 23 at 12:56PM MDT until May 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW ACCUMULATIONS FOR THE SOUTHEAST COLORADO MOUNTAINS ABOVE 9000 FEET THROUGH TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet, Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet, and Wet Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft
